addUser

public void addUser(java.lang.String userName,
                    int lowPort,
                    int highPort,
                    boolean override)
Add the user to this instance.

Parameters:
userName - the user to add.
lowPort - the low port for the user.
highPort - the high port for the user.
override - if false, then only add the user if the name doesn't already exist; otherwise, add the user regardless.
